name: Supply Runner(Demo)
description:
Follow the latest new at http://www.sallet-studio.com


Story:
Our main character have a duty to deliver the soup container to her unit on the frontline, how many obstacle she have to overcome and how many people she will meet on the way?

This is the first playable prototype of our story-telling&running game.

Any comment and advice are welcome.

Thank you
Sallet Team
